0: I decide to head to the back to sit next to uwu.
1: He doesn't appear to have noticed that I've sat next to him so I suppose it's time to reintroduce myself.
2: "H-hey. I suppose I did see you again."
3: He glances up for a second and then his eyes fall back to his phone immediately.
5: I blush a bit from the nickname but uwu doesn't appear to have noticed.
6: "I didn't expect to see you here. You're into games?"
7: "Yea I am.. not very popular games though. I'm mainly dating simulators and visual novels."
9: I hope I didn't weird him out from my preferences.
10: "What do you like to play uwu?"
11: uwu looks up at his phone and stares directly at me.
12: "I want you to guess.. what do you think I'm into?"
13: What kind of games do I think uwu plays?
14: uwu appears flustered at the choice I made.
15: "N-neko Atsume?! You think I would play a kitty collector game?"
16: uwu turns red but I refuse to budge from my choice.
17: uwu avoids eye contact with me for a few seconds and then returns my gaze.
18: "Since you were honest with me about your game choices I'll do the same."
19: "Y-yes you actually got it right.. I play Neko Atsume.. Don't tell anyone ok?"
22: uwu is about as red as a tomato now.
23: "Didn't you also laugh when I told you my preferences?"
24: "It's just so unexpected uwu. I'm glad we both have a weird taste in games."
25: uwu appears to have calmed down a bit and he begins to smile.
26: "Thanks for not judging me harshly based on it."
27: "Oh no, I am judging you. It's a good judgement though uwu."
28: uwu smiles a wider and proceeds to show me his kitty collection.
29: uwu and I decided to team up together for the hackathon.
30: We created a cute game which contained kitties, which apparently are a soft spot for uwu.
31: "H-hey. I had a lot of fun creating the game with you. I'm glad you didn't judge me on my taste."
32: "It was also comforting when you were so open about yours. On top of that, you know the best coffee. We just seem similar, I would like to hang out more sometime."
33: Is he going to ask me for my number?!
34: "Y-yes I would love to. If you try a visual novel some time then I'll try Neko Atsume."
36: Wow he looked so cool when he said that.
37: uwu seems cold at first, but I think he's genuinely a nice guy once he's warmed up a bit.
41: "I look forward to it uwu. Would you mind taking a photo together? I would like to remember the first game we've created."
43: uwu gets close to me and pulls out the camera
44: "Fortnite.. that's a pretty generic answer. I'm kind of offended haha. I thought you would come up with something more interesting for me. No I'm not into that game."
45: Oh.. I guess he really didn't like my answer.
46: We spend the rest of the time sitting next together in awkward silence.
47: After the team building uwu disappeared.
48: I have no clue where he went.
49: I didn't make a team with uwu. So I combined forces with some random people.
50: We did ok. The hackathon wasn't what I dreamed of, but I'm glad to have gotten more experience in the gaming industry.
51: I didn't really get close to anyone. I guess I'm pretty content with being alone with my computer forever.
